reviewText: Cheap, Cheap Packaging but a great show .  Sadly these sets are missing episodes and the packaging stinks however it is nice to have them available.

I was excited to finally finish my collection with season eight. I was very disappointed when I found there are only 4 episodes total on volume one and two. The annoying thing is they put one episode on each disc! I mean why not just put the four episodes on one disc! Very disappointing.
In the Heat of the Night is one of the best TV series ever made.  It's a timeless series and this made a great gift.  They loved it.  I've got the entire series myself...
